tests.name: Wrapped single values
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (K STRING KEY, foo INT) WITH (WRAP_SINGLE_VALUE=true, kafka_topic='input', value_format='KAFKA');

expectedException.message: Format 'KAFKA' does not support 'WRAP_SINGLE_VALUE' set to 'true'.

tests.name: Unwrapped single values
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (K STRING KEY, foo INT) WITH (WRAP_SINGLE_VALUE=false, kafka_topic='input', value_format='KAFKA');

expectedException.message: Format 'KAFKA' does not support 'WRAP_SINGLE_VALUE' set to 'false'.

tests.name: Default single value wrapping
statements: CREATE STREAM INPUT (K STRING KEY, foo INT) WITH (kafka_topic='input', value_format='KAFKA');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT * FROM INPUT;
